input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Expedition Scout"
Reference Product Description:
The Expedition Titanium is ready to go the distance, living up to the Timex legacy of fully equipping you for your adventures ahead while embodying the kind of tradition you can wear every day. Its key feature is its shock-resistant 38mm case rendered in true titanium, offering incredible durability while ensuring a comfortably lightweight feel on the wrist. Reinforcing its 200m water resistance are a screw-down crown and screw-on caseback that effectively keep water out, while the light gray dial features a date window at 3 o'clock and luminescent hands and hour markers for enhanced visibility in lowlight conditions. Clean and modern, itâ€™s powered by a reliable quartz movement and features a sapphire crystal for optimal clarity, a sturdy crown protector, and a smooth grain Italian leather strap ethically sourced from and gold-rated by the Leather Working Group (LWG) and complete with contrast side stitches.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Timex Mens Marlin Chronograph Watch TW2W10100'
  - Name='Timex Men's Expedition Camper Nylon Strap Watch'
  - Name='Timex Expedition Mens Digital Chrono Watch'
  - Name='Timex Expedition North Field Post Solar Men's Watch'
  - Name='Timex Men's Expedition North Field Post Solar 41mm Watch'
  - Name='Men's Fossil Defender Solar-Powered Olive Nylon Watch'
  - Name='Seiko Spirit Military Field Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Chronograph 'Attesa Men's Satellite Wave GPS' Watch CC4105-69E'
  - Name='Citizen Radio Controlled Mens CB0010-88 Watch'
  - Name='Casio G-100-1BVMUR Watch'
  - Name='Citizen Men's Pilot Traveler 3HD Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Automatic Chronograph'
  - Name='Tissot Men's Chemin Des Tourelles'
  - Name='Tissot Seastar Wilson WNBA'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Bannon Multifunction Black Silicone Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Fenmore Three-Hand'
  - Name='Seiko U.s. Army Macv-sog Watch'
  - Name='Orient Men's Sport Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Ancher Stainless Steel Mesh Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Ancher Mono Quartz Watch with Leather Strap'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Mesh Bracelet Quartz Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Marine Star Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Analog-Digital Watch AEQ-120W'
  - Name='Orient Symphony III Automatic Men's Watch'
  - Name='Skagen Men's Kuppel Analogue Quartz Watch'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Mens Marlin Chronograph Watch TW2W10100
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While it is a Timex watch and shares the brand, it is a chronograph with likely different case size, materials, and features, less focused on rugged outdoor use unlike the titanium Expedition model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Expedition Camper Nylon Strap Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is from the same Expedition line focused on outdoor durability and adventure use, similar function and silhouette, though with a nylon strap instead of leather and likely different case material.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Expedition Mens Digital Chrono Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also an Expedition model designed for outdoor use, but digital chronograph differs in movement and dial style from the quartz analog titanium model described.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Expedition North Field Post Solar Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another from the Expedition line with a field watch style, designed for durability and outdoor use, similar utilitarian appeal, though solar-powered instead of quartz and may differ in materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Timex Men's Expedition North Field Post Solar 41mm Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same as above, with 41mm size close to 38mm, solar power and rugged style aligning closely with the reference product's intended use and field watch characteristics.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Fossil Defender Solar-Powered Olive Nylon Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An outdoor/built tough style watch with solar power and nylon strap, similar in adventure focus but different brand and likely different materials and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko Spirit Military Field Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A military field watch by a reputable brand, likely similar in rugged construction, size, and purpose to the Timex Expedition Scout titanium model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Chronograph 'Attesa Men's Satellite Wave GPS' Watch CC4105-69E
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A high-tech chronograph GPS watch, more advanced and complex than the simple rugged quartz titanium field watch, less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Radio Controlled Mens CB0010-88 Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another technologically advanced watch with radio control, differing from the traditional quartz movement and simpler field watch purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio G-100-1BVMUR Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Casio G-shock style offers shock resistance and ruggedness akin to the titanium case durability, serving outdoors use, though digital/analog hybrid and different aesthetic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Citizen Men's Pilot Traveler 3HD Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pilot/traveler watch with features and styling differing in purpose and design from the titanium field watch Expedition model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Automatic Chronograph
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A field watch automatic chronograph known for rugged design and durable construction very similar in style, function, and audience to the Timex Expedition Scout Titanium.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Men's Chemin Des Tourelles
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A dressier, classic style watch likely less rugged and outdoor focused than the reference titanium field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot Seastar Wilson WNBA
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A diver or sport watch likely focused on aquatic sport with design differing substantially from the titanium field watch design.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Bannon Multifunction Black Silicone Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: More fashion-oriented watch with silicone strap, less focus on rugged outdoor durability compared to titanium case field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Fenmore Three-Hand
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A simpler three-hand watch with fashion brand style, less emphasis on ruggedness and durability than the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Seiko U.s. Army Macv-sog Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A military field watch with similar rugged purpose, size, and construction focus, highly relevant to the Timex Expedition Scout titanium model.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Men's Sport Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A sport watch with automatic movement, likely rugged and outdoor oriented similar in spirit to the reference, but differing in some features and brand positioning.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Ancher Stainless Steel Mesh Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: More lifestyle/minimalist style watch with mesh stainless steel band, less rugged and outdoor focused than titanium field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Ancher Mono Quartz Watch with Leather Strap
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz watch with leather strap but more dressy/minimalist than rugged titanium field watch, focusing on style over durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Mesh Bracelet Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz minimalist watch with mesh bracelet, low overlap with rugged outdoor wearable titanium field watch.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Marine Star Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Marine sport watch with automatic movement, more water sport oriented but some overlap in ruggedness though different style and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Analog-Digital Watch AEQ-120W
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Analog-digital hybrid watch with rugged Casio build, somewhat similar utility but different styling and possibly less premium materials than titanium case.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Symphony III Automatic Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dressy automatic watch with formal styling, less rugged and outdoor focused compared to titanium field watch Expedition Scout.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Skagen Men's Kuppel Analogue Quartz Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Quartz minimalist watch with dressy style, less related to rugged titanium field watch purpose.
